artist: Painter: Jan Asselyn; Engraver: Rose Angelique Moitte
description: landscape with herder driving cows to river; ruins at left, foliage covered; figure in river
inscription:
Signature and Inscriptions

on sheet below image in black:[J. Asselyn pinx    Angel. Moitte  sc./ Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain]; UR corner of image in black: [5]; lower left corner in pencil: [1-44]; upper right corner: [72]
portfolio: From from "Cabinet Poullain; Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'apres les tableaux & dessing qui composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain", plate 5
